snippet: The ruling by a Delhi judge came in a case in which a woman accused a man of drugging her, abducting her, taking her to Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh, to register their marriage, and then raping her.
abstract: Indian court in Delhi has ruled that sex between a husband and wife is not rape, even if forcible.
lead_paragraph: The ruling by a Delhi judge came in a case in which a woman accused a man of drugging her, abducting her, taking her to Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh, to register their marriage, and then raping her.

headline.main: Indian Court Says Forced Marital Sex Is Not Rape
headline.print_headline: India: Court Rules That Marital Sex, Even When Forced, Is Not Rape
